channel.title: Delta Green: Reverberations
channel.description:
<!-- @page { margin: 0.79in } P { margin-bottom: 0.08in } A:link { so-language: zxx } -->
![A STRANGE BUZZING SHAPE|351x500](upload://hzq4mgl8qbyfrSWWa8WgJv7sk1k.jpeg) After a series of unusual disappearances in the Chicago underworld Delta Green sends agents to investigate.
Session 1: [date=2022-01-08 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2022-01-08 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-Mq4SfL706jlfdSfA6gG Session 2: [date=2022-01-15 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2022-01-15 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-Mq4TI6FoAcYFzDtExaA Session 3: [date=2022-01-22 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2022-01-22 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-Mq4UJqtMEPt1zuYSqew
Delta Green is a horror roleplaying game. There will be violence and gore. Reverberations specifically has themes of drug abuse and anti-Asian racism.
We will be using the X-Card, Lines and Veils and CATS. The game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html.). We will be using jitsi for the video call. I will send a reminder per email a week before we play.
This is part of the Gauntlet Delta Green shared world. New and returning agents are equally welcome. One seat is reserved to a B B. Surviving agents new to the program will be added to the roster at the end of the series.

item.title: Delta Green: Reverberations
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

A STRANGE BUZZING SHAPE2500×3552 2.86 MB

After a series of unusual disappearances in the Chicago underworld Delta Green sends agents to investigate.

Session 1: Saturday, January 8, 2022 5:00 PM → Saturday, January 8, 2022 8:00 PM https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-Mq4SfL706jlfdSfA6gG

Session 3: Saturday, January 22, 2022 5:00 PM → Saturday, January 22, 2022 8:00 PM
https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-Mq4UJqtMEPt1zuYSqew

Delta Green is a horror roleplaying game. There will be violence and gore. Reverberations specifically has themes of drug abuse and anti-Asian racism.

We will be using the X-Card, Lines and Veils and CATS. The game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct. We will be using jitsi for the video call. I will send a reminder per email a week before we play.

This is part of the Gauntlet Delta Green shared world. New and returning agents are equally welcome. One seat is reserved to a B B. Surviving agents new to the program will be added to the roster at the end of the series.
